title: Dealers Will Be Slashing Prices on These 3 Discontinued Cars This Fall
description: A handful of established models have been scheduled to hit the chopping block in the near future, and drivers could subsequently score a deal. Dealers are more motivated to clear an outgoing model’s inventory, since it’s a depreciating asset that’s taking up storage space from faster-selling units, ...
titleSummary: "Discounts Loom for 3 Defunct Models in Autumn Price Cuts"
descriptionSummary: Several outgoing models will be phased out soon, creating opportunities for car buyers to snag a discounted deal. As dealers make room for newer stock, they'll be more inclined to sell remaining inventory at a lower price.

title: First Porsche, Then Lamborghini — Now a Safari Ferrari Joins the Party
description: At SEMA 2025, Virginia-based GlasWerks DMV unveiled the Elevato, a radical reimagining of Ferrari's GTC4Lusso. The exotic shooting brake has been transformed into what the company calls the world's first luxury V12 Italian off-roader. The inspiration? GlasWerks DMV CEO, Adrian Mallory’s own Porsche ...
titleSummary: Ferrari's Adventurous Off-Roader Joins Exclusive Club of Ultra-Luxury SUVs Made by Rivals
descriptionSummary: At SEMA 2025, Virginia-based GlasWerks DMV unveiled a show-stopping makeover of Ferrari's GTC4Lusso, elevating the exotic shooting brake into a groundbreaking luxury off-roader with a potent V12 engine and an unconventional twist on Italian design sensibilities.

title: Stellantis Ex-CEO Says The Quiet Part Out Loud About Tesla's Future
description: In the not-too-distant past, Tesla was regarded as a major disruptor of the American car industry, as the now Texas-based firm had been at the forefront of developing some of the most desirable and bestselling electric vehicles ever to hit the market. No matter your opinion about the Elon Musk-led ...
titleSummary: Former Stellantis CEO Spills on Electric Giant Tesla's Uncertain Road Ahead
descriptionSummary: Tesla's impact on the automotive landscape has been significant, particularly in the US where it pioneered a new era of sleek, high-performance electric vehicles that captivated consumers and redefined the industry's trajectory.

title: This Fox Body Mustang Stole the Show at SEMA — and Now You Can Buy One
description: Velocity Restorations wowed SEMA 2025 with what it calls the world's first production restomod Fox Body Mustang. It’s a thoroughly modernized 1991 LX that's heading into production as part of the company's Signature Series lineup in 2026. The timing couldn't be better. Fox Body Mustangs are ...

descriptionSummary: At SEMA 2025, Velocity Restorations unveiled its groundbreaking restomod Fox Body Mustang, set to hit the market in 2026 as part of the Signature Series. This innovative model masterfully merges classic style with cutting-edge technology.

title: Someone Finally Built the BMW Z4 Coupe — Using a Toyota Supra
description: The E85 BMW Z4 was available in both coupe and convertible versions, and the same applied to the E89 generation, but with the current G29 variant, BMW has only made the Z4 available with a convertible soft-top. Whether that's because BMW figured the Z4 occupies too small a niche to justify the ...
titleSummary: "Meet the BMW that's been reborn – with a Toyota twist."
descriptionSummary: For its latest iteration, the G29-generation BMW Z4 is offered exclusively as a convertible, marking a departure from its predecessors' dual coupe and drop-top configurations.

title: Don't Buy an EV Truck Until You See These Shocking Insurance Costs
description: When it comes to electrified vehicles, most automakers have the basics figured out. A giant battery, spacious cabin, and a dash-wide screen are the pillars of a great EV platform. Nailing the basics of EV crossovers and sedans has helped automakers branch into trucks and large SUVs, turning many ...
titleSummary: "Electric Trucks' Hidden Cost: Insuring Your Dream Ride May Be a Stunner"
descriptionSummary: With their fundamental needs met, electric vehicle manufacturers have turned to more ambitious projects: electrifying larger vehicles like trucks and SUVs, building on the success they've achieved with smaller crossover models.

title: Lexus Has Attractive 2025 GX Lease Deals for November
description: The Lexus GX has long been the sidekick of the larger and more luxurious LX, and it has fulfilled that role for over 20 years now. descriptionSummary: The C8 Corvette shook up the automotive scene upon its 2020 debut, offering blistering performance at an unprecedented price point under $60,000. However, a major omission marred the experience for many: the lack of a manual gearbox option left enthusiasts wanting more.

What started as a handful of isolated complaints has now become a recurring safety issue, one serious enough to draw renewed attention from the National Highway Traffic ...

However, this is just the beginning for the iconic SUV.

description: Rivian’s third-quarter numbers may look good on paper, but they come at a complicated moment for the electric vehicle industry. The company is growing fast but facing a tougher market as overall EV demand in the US – and the whole world – softens. For the quarter ending September 2025, Rivian ...
titleSummary: "Rivian's Electric Dreams Rest on Delivering the R2 Without a Hitch"
descriptionSummary: Rivian's impressive third-quarter performance masks a challenging backdrop: a rapidly evolving electric vehicle landscape. The company's rapid growth is being met with softer overall EV demand in the US and globally, complicating its trajectory.

title: The Supersports is Returning to Become The Ultimate Bentley Continental GT The Ultimate Continental GT

title: Honda’s Next-Generation V6 Is Coming — And This Time, It’s a Hybrid

titleSummary: "Honda's New Eco-Powered V6 Engine Takes Center Stage with Hybrid Innovation"
descriptionSummary: Honda is gearing up for a pivotal period in the automotive industry. At a recent media event, the company unveiled an ambitious roadmap for the late 2020s, showcasing innovative technologies and products set to debut by 2025 and beyond.

title: New Survey Exposes New Car Buyer Attitudes Toward Chinese Cars
description: The global automotive landscape is shifting dramatically towards the East. descriptionSummary: The global auto industry is undergoing a significant eastward shift as consumers increasingly warm up to Chinese-made cars, a trend highlighted in a recent study by Boston Consulting Group, one of the world's top management firms.

title: Bentley’s First Electric SUV Is Coming — But the V8 Isn’t Going Anywhere

titleSummary: "BMW's Electrifying Future Unveiled: Spotted! The iX4 Takes Shape on the Road"

title: The New Honda Prelude Is Missing Something the CR-Z Had — On Purpose
description: That would be a manual transmission. Yes, Honda did say that the revived Prelude will be e-CVT-only even before it made its world premiere. Granted, it's an enhanced and uprated version found in the Civic hybrid, but judging by comments made about it, there is some clamor for it. Honda doesn't ...

descriptionSummary: The revival of the Prelude will indeed feature a manual transmission, despite initial reports suggesting e-CVT-only models. An upgraded version of the Civic hybrid's CVT has been implemented, although some enthusiasts are still calling for the option of a stick shift.

title: Kia Delays EV3 and Freezes EV4 Launch as EV Market Goes Cold
description: A quick glance at the October sales charts reveals that even the most dire forecasts weren’t pessimistic enough when it came to EV demand. titleSummary: Kia Puts Brakes on Electric Dreams Amid Cooling Demand for Eco-Friendly Vehicles
descriptionSummary: Electric vehicle sales have surpassed all expectations in October's market trends, with forecasts now seeming overly cautious. Automakers are scrambling to reassess their manufacturing and development strategies for upcoming models, including Kia's plans.

title: Japan Wants 10,000 Driverless Cars on the Road by 2030

title: Toyota Recalls More Than 1 Million Vehicles For A Potentially Dangerous Glitch

title: Ford’s EV Struggles Don’t Matter When Its Trucks Sell Like This
description: Ford’s U.S. sales climbed 1.6 percent year-over-year to 174,584 vehicles, with pickups leading the charge. title: Hyundai Is About to Have a Truck for Every Buyer

descriptionSummary: The Hyundai Group's impressive portfolio spans everything from compact hatches to luxury sedans, high-performance sports cars, and eco-friendly crossovers, but one crucial category has long been missing: a true, high-end truck.
